notes: proper noun; city name; usually used without article
rare; proper noun rarely used with indefinite article
example_sentence_italian: Non ho visto un torino così affollato.
example_sentence_english: I have not seen a Turin so crowded.

notes: used for the football club 'Il Torino'; city usually without article
example_sentence_italian: Ho tifato per il torino da giovane.
example_sentence_english: I supported Torino when I was young.

notes: plural form; rare for a city name
example_sentence_italian: In alcune mappe antiche ci sono torini disegnati.
example_sentence_english: Some Turins are drawn on some old maps.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visto i torini nelle immagini.
example_sentence_english: I saw the Turins in the images.

notes: partitive plural form; rare for proper noun
example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato dei torini in quell'album.
example_sentence_english: I found some Turins in that album.

notes: contraction used mainly for the football club; city normally 'di Torino'
example_sentence_italian: La storia del torino è interessante.
example_sentence_english: The history of Turin is interesting.

notes: contraction uncommon for city; used for the club or specific contexts
plural contraction; very rare for a city
example_sentence_italian: Parlavano ai torini durante la riunione.
example_sentence_english: They spoke to the Turins during the meeting.
I received letters from the Turins.

notes: contraction uncommon for cities; often 'a/in Torino'
example_sentence_italian: Ho perso il portafoglio nel torino.
example_sentence_english: I lost my wallet in Turin.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono errori nei torini dell'archivio.
example_sentence_english: There are errors in the Turins of the archive.

notes: used for topics about the club or publications; city usually 'su Torino'
example_sentence_english: I read an article about Turin.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato foto sui torini online.
example_sentence_english: I found photos about the Turins online.

notes: used to mean 'with Torino' often about collaboration with the club
example_sentence_italian: Collaboro col torino su un progetto.
example_sentence_english: I collaborate with Torino on a project.
